get.description: This API will be used to validate a token that was generated during an SSO (Single Sign-On) process.

mobileReg.description: true If mobile number registed in system

userReg.description: true If user registed in system

msg.description: If mobile number registed in system, then this meassage will show to user

refId.description: refId used in all SSO integration API

get.description: This API will be used to validate a token that was generated during an SSO (Single Sign-On) process. Response will be in encrypted format

This API allows users to link their existing mobile number (already registered in the system) with their SSO ID. If successful, the user's account will be migrated to use SSO for login, while keeping their existing mobile number.

This API allows users to link their existing mobile number (already registered in the system) with their SSO ID. If successful, the user's account will be migrated to use SSO for login, while keeping their existing mobile number.
This API will be used when a user opts not to link their account with an old mobile number or is a fresh user registering through SSO (Single Sign-On).
This API will be used when a user opts not to link their account with an old mobile number or is a fresh user registering through SSO (Single Sign-On). Response will be in encripted format

post.description: This API facilitates the linking of a user's existing mobile number with their SSO ID. It sends an OTP to the existing mobile number to verify the ownership before proceeding with the link.

value.responseDesc: One Time Password (OTP) has been sent to your mobile

post.description: This API endpoint verifies an OTP sent to a user’s registered mobile number. If the OTP is valid, it completes the registration process by linking the existing mobile number with the provided SSO ID.

This API allows users to link their existing mobile number (already registered in the system) with their SSO ID. If successful, the user's account will be migrated to use SSO for login, while keeping their existing mobile number.
